remarks: Two functionals with the same kernel are the same up to a constant. (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-2014.)
statement:

eqlkr2 $p |- ( ( W e. LVec /\ ( G e. F /\ H e. F ) /\ ( L ` G ) = ( L ` H ) ) -> E. r e. K H = ( G oF .x. ( V X. { r } ) ) ) $.
